content: hook into same space as join on the top of the hat and then into any double_crochet on the crown yo and pull loop through both layers yo and pull thru both loops on hook 1 single_crochet completed continue around only working into the double_crochet stitches of the crown skipping the chain-2 corner spaces fasten_off 60 single_crochet brim is worked in joined rounds round 1- join mc to any double_crochet on the bottom edge of the crown chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in each double_crochet and 1 single_crochet in each chain-2 corner space join with slip_stitch to first stitch 70 single_crochet round 2- chain 1 half_double_crochet in same stitch as join *2 half_double_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in next st repeat from * to last st 2 half_double_crochet in last st join with slip_stitch 105 half_double_crochet round 3- chain 1 half_double_crochet in same stitch as join half_double_crochet in each st around join with slip_stitch 105 half_double_crochet round 4- repeat round 3 round 5- chain 1 single_crochet in same stitch as join single_crochet in each st around fasten_off 105 single_crochet weave in ends
